mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_SQ_PK, M.MEM_NICKNM, FRG.PST_GRP_SQ_PK, FRG.PST_OP_TYPE_FK, FRG.PST_GRP_REG_DT, FRG.HITS, O_FR.PST_TITLE, O_FR.PST_REG_DT, COUNT(CMT.CMT_SQ_PK) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM PST_GRP_TB AS FRG LEFT JOIN CMT_GRP_TB AS CMTGRP ON(FRG.CMT_GRP_FK = CMTGRP.CMT_GRP_SQ_PK) LEFT JOIN CMT_TB AS CMT ON(CMTGRP.CMT_GRP_SQ_PK = CMT.CMT_GRP_FK) LEFT JOIN MEM_TB AS M ON(FRG.MEM_FK = M.MEM_SQ_PK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FR.PST_SQ_PK, FR.PST_GRP_FK, FR.PST_TITLE, FR.PST_REG_DT FROM PST_TB AS FR INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(PST_SQ_PK) AS MAX_SEQ FROM PST_TB GROUP BY PST_GRP_FK ) AS M_FR ON(FR.PST_SQ_PK = M_FR.MAX_SEQ) ) AS O_FR ON(FRG.PST_GRP_SQ_PK = O_FR.PST_GRP_FK) WHERE FRG.PST_OP_TYPE_FK <> 'CLOSE' ORDER BY FRG.PST_GRP_SQ_PK DESC LIMIT ${start}, ${pagesize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PST_GRP_TB WHERE PST_OP_TYPE_FK <> 'CLOSE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PST_TB( PST_GRP_FK, PST_REG_DT, FILE_GRP_FK, PST_TITLE, PST_BODY )VALUES( #{freeboardGroupNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{fileGroupNo}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardBody} )
mapper.select: SELECT FIG.FILE_GRP_SQ_PK FROM PST_GRP_TB AS FRG INNER JOIN PST_TB AS FR ON(FRG.PST_GRP_SQ_PK = FR.PST_GRP_FK) INNER JOIN FILE_GRP_TB AS FIG ON(FR.FILE_GRP_FK = FIG.FILE_GRP_SQ_PK) WHERE FRG.PST_GRP_SQ_PK = #{freeboardGroupNo}
